tools.title: Slack
tools.desc: Slack brings all your communication together in one place. It’s real-time messaging, archiving, and search for modern teams.

tools.title: Google Keep
tools.desc: Google Keep is a tool to share lists and ideas (or keep them to yourself). You can access Google Keep through the website or using the iOS or Android App.

tools.title: InVision
tools.desc: InVision lets you transform your designs into beautiful, interactive web and mobile (iOS, Android) mockups and prototypes.

tools.title: Trello
tools.desc: Trello keeps track of everything, from the big picture to the minute details.

tools.title: Appear.in
tools.desc: Video conversations with up to 8 people for free—no login, no downloads. Create a video room. Share the link. Appear together.

tools.title: Yammer
tools.desc: A social network for business, Yammer provides a platform for you to communicate and collaborate privately with your colleagues.

tools.title: Dropbox
tools.desc: Dropbox simplifies the way you create, share, and collaborate. Bring your photos, docs, and videos anywhere and keep your files safe.

tools.title: Basecamp
tools.desc: Basecamp is a web-based project management and collaboration tool. To-dos, files, messages, schedules, and milestones.

tools.title: Red Pen
tools.desc: Upload your design and get live, annotated feedback—get thoughts from the people you trust.

tools.title: Mural
tools.desc: Mural strives to make remote-design works. It's a tool for online brainstorming, synthesis, and collaboration

tools.title: Amium
tools.desc: Amium turns any file into a real-time activity feed and conversation.

tools.title: Lingo
tools.desc: Cloud connected visual asset library that empowers creation and ensures visual consistency for entire teams.

tools.title: Wake
tools.desc: Wake is a tool for designers to share work and collect feedback from their team.

tools.title: Zeplin
tools.desc: Collaboration app for UI designers and front-end developers to create and share style guides and design resources.

tools.title: Sympli
tools.desc: Sympli generates style guides, specs, and assets for design handoff and helps implementation for teams that work with Photoshop, Sketch, Android Studio, and Xcode.

tools.title: Avocode
tools.desc: Avocode turns PSD or Sketch design asset into code. Available for Mac, Windows, and Linux.

tools.title: Frontify
tools.desc: Frontify is an online software for brand style guides, design workflows, and visual collaboration.

tools.title: Abstract
tools.desc: Abstract is version control tool for design work. It brings new clarity to the tools you already use, making design work organized, documented, and connected.

tools.title: Notion
tools.desc: A Mac app that helps teams organize docs, wikis, and tasks from various tools in single place.

tools.title: Duco
tools.desc: Duco helps everyone runs successful design sprints.

tools.title: Inboard
tools.desc: Inboard is a Mac app used to create and organize your screenshots, images, and photos.

tools.title: Bynder
tools.desc: Bynder is an online app for brand management and digital asset management.

tools.title: Asana
tools.desc: Asana is project management tool that allow you to track the team's work.

tools.title: ProdPad
tools.desc: With ProdPad you can build and share your flexible product roadmap, and prioritize your backlog.
